channel.title: Gpio Ground connection
channel.description:
Hi
I am working on creating my own guitar pedal hardware. I want to connect a bunch of leds, footswitches, jacks for expression pedals and poentiometers to the axoloti. I am doing so on a circuit board with many holes (dont know the name in english).
Can I connect the ground of all this to the same ground connection on axoloti? That would make laying out the circuit a lot easier. Or should I use differend grnd pins on the axoloti for each element? (one for the leds, one for ins, one for outs etc)

item.title: Gpio Ground connection
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon
item.description:
@Blindsmyth wrote:

Great and thx for the english lesson

Read full topic

item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Blindsmyth:

I am doing so on a circuit board with many holes (dont know the name in english).

"perfboard", "stripboard", "protoboard"

Blindsmyth:

Can I connect the ground of all this to the same ground connection on axoloti

Yes

Read full topic
